titleStmt.title: Deux essays d'arithmetique politique, touchant les villes et hospitaux de Londres et Paris. Dedie's au Roy, par le chevalier Petty, de la Société Royale
titleStmt.author: Petty, William, Sir, 1623-1687.

publicationStmt.publisher: chés B.G. et se vendent par Franc̜ois Vaillant, Marchand Libraire demeurant dans le Strand, vis à vis l'Eglise Franc̜oise de la Savoye,

notesStmt.note: "The Deux essays, .. were written in English, but Hull brings forward evidence shewing that they were first published in French" - Cf. Keynes.
Copy cropped at foot, affecting text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
